page.title: 03TEALING SCHOOL
page.content: TEALING SCHOOL WAS BUILT c.1881 AND CONSISTED OF 2 CLASSROOMS.c1912 A THIRD CLASSROOM WAS ADDED TO THE EAST OF THE ORIGINAL BUILDING AND THE SCHOOL BECAME A 3 TEACHER SCHOOL. IN 1963 A NEW DINING HALL WAS BUILT TO THE NORTH OF, AND SEPARATE FROM THE SCHOOL.IN 1972 THE SCHOOL WAS EXTENSIVELY MODERNISED.THE OLD SCHOOL WAS ALTERED TO HOUSE AN INFANT ROOM,GENERAL PURPOSE ROOM,AN OFFICE & STAFFROOM,STAFF TOILETS,INFANT CLOAKROOM & TOILETS AND A CLEANERS STORE. A BLOCK OF 3 MOBILE CLASSROOMS WAS BUILT TO THE WEST OF,AND LINKED TO THE ORIGINAL SCHOOL.INCLUDED IN THE NEW BLOCK WERE TOILETS FOR THE SENIOR PUPILS AND A CLEANERS STORE. A NARROW GAMES PARK RUNS DOWN THE WEST SIDE OF THE SCHOOL AND SCHOOLHOUSE(SOUTH OF THE NEW UNITS).
